mapper.select: select channel_id, pre_balance, balance, channel_fee, order_no, merchant_order_no, create_time, remark, update_by from zf_channel_trans where channel_id = #{channelId}
mapper.insert: insert into zf_channel_trans(pre_balance, balance, channel_fee, order_no, merchant_order_no, remark, update_by, trans_type) values (#{preBalance}, #{balance}, #{channelFee}, #{orderNo}, #{merchantOrderNo}, #{remark}, #{updateBy}, #{transType})

insert into zf_channel_trans(pre_balance, balance, channel_fee, order_no, merchant_order_no, create_time, remark, update_by) values
(#{entity.preBalance}, #{entity.balance}, #{entity.channelFee}, #{entity.orderNo}, #{entity.merchantOrderNo}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.updateBy})

insert into zf_channel_trans(pre_balance, balance, channel_fee, order_no, merchant_order_no, create_time, remark, update_by) values
(#{entity.preBalance}, #{entity.balance}, #{entity.channelFee}, #{entity.orderNo}, #{entity.merchantOrderNo}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.updateBy})
on duplicate key update pre_balance = values(pre_balance), balance = values(balance), channel_fee = values(channel_fee), order_no = values(order_no), merchant_order_no = values(merchant_order_no), create_time = values(create_time), remark = values(remark), update_by = values(update_by)
mapper.update:
update zf_channel_trans
pre_balance = #{preBalance},
balance = #{balance},
channel_fee = #{channelFee},
order_no = #{orderNo},
merchant_order_no = #{merchantOrderNo},
create_time = #{createTime},
remark = #{remark},
update_by = #{updateBy},
where channel_id = #{channelId}
